alert.note: Alert for Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 4:16AM CDT until May 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water affects low lying buildings in rural areas. Water affects the railroad tracks in Alexandria. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:40 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 14.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
